law.text: [ Text of section effective until January 1, 2013. For text effective January 1, 2013, see below.] An appropriation shall supersede an earlier one made for the same object. Chapter 29: Successive appropriations [ Text of section as recodified by 2012, 165, Sec. 112 effective January 1, 2013. See 2012, 165, Sec. 137. For text effective until January 1, 2013, see above.] An appropriation shall supersede an earlier one made for the same object.
